main.description: Start a single-player Apocalypse mod game. One person plays against the computer. Choose a custom game for more options or to play with more than one human player.

game.description: Play a practice level against targets that don't fire back. Start with all of the weapons.
Play a quick game against easy computer players. Buy immediately with lots of money.
Play a quick game against normal strength computer players. Buy immediately with some money.
Play a quick game against hard computer players. Buy immediately with little money.
